metadata.title: CVE-2018-6055 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Insufficient policy enforcement in Catalog Service in Google Chrome priorto 64.0.3282.119 allowed a remote attacker to potentially run arbitrarycode outside sandbox via a crafted HTML page.

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
oxide-qt: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
